복수일 경우 콤마(,)로 구분: Separated by comma(,) if there are multiple attendees.

전체 반복 일정 삭제: Delete all the events in the series
이 일정부터 이후 일정 모두 수정: Edit all the following events in the series
전체 반복 일정 수정: Edit all the events in the series
길이 제한을 초과하였습니다. 초과된 부분을 자동으로 삭제합니다: It exceeds the maximum length. Part of the excess will be automatically deleted.
제목은 {{max}}자까지 가능합니다: You can enter up to {{max}} characters in the subject.
장소는 {{max}}자까지 가능합니다: You can enter up to {{max}} characters in the Where field.
내용은 {{max}}자까지 가능합니다: You can enter up to {{max}} characters in the Description field.
미리알림 값은 숫자만 가능합니다: You have to enter digits in to the Reminder field.
미리알림 값은 최소 0이상이어야 합니다: Reminder must be bigger than zero.
You can set up to {{max}} reminders.
요일을 선택해주세요: Please select day of the week.
일정 등록시 오류가 발생하였습니다: An error has occurred while adding an event.
관심 캘린더로 추가할 부서원이 존재하지 않습니다: There is no staff you can add a calendar to Favorite.
검색어와 일치하는 일정이 없습니다: No event found matched with the keyword.
일정명은 {{max}}자 이하로 입력해 주십시오: The length of subject must be {{max}}  or below.
일정을 열람할 수 없습니다: You are not allowed to read.
관심 캘린더가 되면 일정을 열람할 수 있습니다:
You can view his/her events
once you added his/her calendar to Favorite.
Private events are only allowed to be read by its attendees.
Company events are open to everyone.
알람 설정은 {{max}}개까지 가능합니다: You can set up to {{max}} reminders.
현재 관심 동료가 없습니다. 아래 조직도를 통해 다른 사용자의 일정을 열:
No Following Colleagues Found.
You can read others’ events through the Organization Tree below.
일정의 참석자로 추가할 사용자를 아래에서 선택하세요: Assign an attendee to this event.
관심 캘린더 수락 메시지: He/She can view my events because he/she added my calendar to Favorite.
내 일정을 누구나 열람 할 수 있습니다: My events are open to everyone.
신청과 수락을 통하여 상대방이 내 일정을 열람할 수 있습니다: People can view my events as long as they get approval from me.
비공개 일정은 위 옵션과 관계없이 일정 참석자만 열람할 수 있습니다: Regardless of the option above, private events are only allowed to be read by its attendees
멤버를 선택하지 않으셨습니다. 멤버를 선택해주세요:
You have not selected a member.
Please select a member.
대기상태의 캘린더를 선택해주세요: Please select a calendar who is waiting.
관심 캘린더 신청을 수락하시겠습니까?: Would you allow him/her to add your calendar to Favorite?
관심동료 신청을 취소하시겠습니까?: Would you like to withdraw the request of Following Colleague?
관심 캘린더 목록에서 삭제하시겠습니까?:
Are you sure you want to delete him/her calendar
from Favorite?
상대방이 신청한 관심 캘린더를 삭제하시겠습니까?: Would you like to delete the request that he/she adds your calendar to Favorite?
관심 캘린더 해제 알림 메시지:
You can no longer view his/her events.
You can view his/her events through Organization Tree or you can add his/her calendar to Favorite.
상대방 관심 캘린더 중지 알림 메시지:
He/She will no longer see my events.
Are you sure to delete it?
일정을 삭제하시면 모든 참석자의 일정에서 사라집니다. 참석자에서 빠지고:
If you delete an event, the event will be removed from all the attendees' Calendar.
If you do not want to attend, please click Not Attend.
참석자에서 빠지면 내 일정에서 노출되지 않습니다. 하지만, 다른 참석자의:
If you leave this event, your calendar does not display it any more.
However, it will remain others calendar. Are you sure you want to leave?
선택한 사용자 정보가 없습니다: No information found on the user.
관심동료 삭제시 오류가 발생하였습니다: An error has occurred while deleting a calendar from Favorite.
관심동료 순서변경시 오류가 발생하였습니다: An error has occurred while changing an order of calendars from Favorite.
This event has included reservation. Would you like to cancel the reservation?
일정 변경시 자산 예약 취소 메시지: If you change the event, the reservation on it will be discarded. Would you like to continue?
You can view his/her calendar once he/she accepts your request.

Please add one.

참석자 알람 안내 메시지: A notification will be sent to attendees.
참석자 추가 확인 메시지: Would you like to add {{dept}} to attendee?
캘린더 수정요청 진행중 메시지: Another request is being processed. Please try it again later.
일정등록에 대한 알림메일을 보내시겠습니까?: Would you like to send a notification message about this event?
일정수정에 대한 알림메일을 보내시겠습니까?: Would you like to send a notification message about this event?
The end time can not be earlier than the start time.
외부참석자 이메일 형식을 확인해 주십시오: Please check the email form of external participant.
It shows only conference rooms that are available at the time you've currently set.

{{arg1}} {{arg2}} want to add your calendar to Favorite.
'{{arg3}}' Would you like to accept it?

Send alarms about event registration to attendees.
관심 캘린더 50개까지만 추가 가능 문구: You can follow up to 50 calendars.
전사일정 삭제 메시지:
Are you sure you want to delete the company event?
If you delete the event, it will disappear from all attendees' calendars.
나혼자 일정 삭제 메시지:
Are you sure you want to delete this event?
Deleted events are not recoverable.
반복일정 중 수정된 일정 설명: Schedule that edits existing recurring events.
일정을 복사하시겠습니까?: Do you want to copy the schedule?
All day,Repeat settings and Reserve are excluded from copy ranges.
참석자 일정확인 최대 인원 설명: Only up to 50 attendees can be checked.
참석자 일정확인 상세일정 확인여부 설명: You cannot check the detailed schedule, but you can only check the schedule of the participants.
참석자 일정확인 기능 사용가능 알림:
Attendees, check the free time of the facility
Find the best time.
참석자 일정확인 기능 종일일정 알림: If you have a full-day schedule, you cannot inquire about the attendee's hourly schedule.
